review:
Its been a month since I'm using this amazing phone.  
What i liked-  
Screen(best and super bright)  
Speed  
Camera  
Dash charging  
Looks and ergonomics  
Over-all performance  
Face unlock is blink fast and same with finger print sensor.❤️❤️  
What I didn't liked much  
  
Without any case it feels slippery...not that grippy.  
  
Camera is awesome bjt could've been much better.(but in this price its top
notch)  
  
Well i guess thats it.  
Just go for this beast...Ull never regret your choice.

Awesome phone. Grab without a doubt. Performance is unmatched and smooth.
Battery life is decent and with Dash charge, it's a beauty.  
Camera is good, you can get better at this price and more.  
One thing that surely you can't get is performance with Oxygen OS which is
worth leaving any other feature. Face unlock is out of the world. Work
flawless.  
Screen is amazing and low Pixel means better battery life.

What a brilliant phone! The camera is awesome, the screen clarity is superb,
performance is top notch. It looks good, very sleek and stylish.  
The service was great. Arrived on time. Packaging was good too. I'm extremely
happy with my purchase! Thank you Amazon.

Awesome phone with very nice features. Good battery life with very fast
charging .. camera won't disappoint u a bit . And no lagging . With 6 GB ram
it works like a flowing liquid . No hiccups ....

An amazing product from OnePlus again. Very optimised OS, good battery life. I
upgraded to 5T from 3T and i can see the significance difference from both the
camera, charging speed, battery backup n auto brightness display under sun.

Excellent phone. But in such prize water resistant is not there. Ir remote
also not available. Memory card slot also not available.front flash also not
available.

Worth for money until next one plus 6 launch

The device is great. The pre-applied screen protector is not too good. Better
to take off and get original tempered glass.

Amazing device , excellent optimization of the RAM and great camera
performance. OnePlus could've included an extra or a hybrid microSD slot but
unfortunately there's no SD card slot.

Toooooo good
